content: crochet **ladybug or ladybird amigurumi** *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** dk 3 light 2 5 mm 12 uk crochet hook tapestry needle cotton stuffing or polyfill safety eyes 6 mm black embroidery floss **yarn** i used paintbox yarns cotton dk *137 yds / 125 m per 50 g* in the following colors **grey** stormy grey 405 **black** pure black 402 **red** pillar red 415 **white** champagne white 403 feel free to use any comparable yarn that meets gauge **size** 4 10 cm by 3 7 6 cm **gauge** 4 rounds in single_crochet in 1 2 5 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
